#labels manual,Phase-Deploy
== Command List ==

===General===
|| *Usage        *    || *Description* ||
|| kick $cn || Kick a player. ||
|| clearbans || Clear non persistent bans. ||
|| spec/unspec $cn || Set or remove spectator. ||
|| mute / unmute $cn || Mute or un-mute a player. ||
|| givemaster / takemaster $cn || Gives or takes master. ||
|| mastermode $mm || Sets mastermode to mm. ||
|| map $mode $mapname || Changes map / mode. ||
|| say $text || Displays text in game ||
|| getmotd/setmotd $text || Displays / sets the current message of the day.||
|| giveinvmaster / takeinvmaster $cn || Gives or takes invisible master.||
|| ban $cn || Creates a persistent ban. This ban only lasts until the server process is restarted.||


===Informational===

|| *Usage        *    || *Description* ||
|| status || Displays the current game status.||
|| help || Duh||
|| who || Displays a list of connected players.||
|| score || Displays the current scoreboard.||
|| getvar &cubescriptvar || Displays the value of a cubescript var.||
|| version || Displays the current hopmod / hopbot revisions.||
|| showalias $cn || Displays list of other aliases used..||

===Administration===
|| *Usage* || *Description*|| 
|| update $password || Updates the bot from svn. This is best to do in a private message. For the changes to take affect you must issue a die command.||
|| cubescript $text $password> || Executes a block of cubescript. This is best to do in a private message.||
|| getslots/setslots $num || Displays / sets the number of player connections.||
|| die || Restarts the IRC bot Process.||
|| restart server || Restarts the game server process.||


=== Module Dependant ===
|| *Usage* || *Description*|| 
|| find $optional_search_string || Locates players clan tags or lists players on common servers. Examples find PSL / find {QS} / find PunDit||
